h1: How Many Calories in a Shot of Espresso?
assumptions: Standard single shot (30 ml), black, brewed from arabica beans, no additives like sugar, milk, or syrup.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bean type, roast, brewing method, and machine; values are approximate. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A single shot of espresso has just ~2 kcal, mostly from trace carbs.

faqs.q: How many calories in a shot of espresso?
faqs.a: Approximately 2 kcal for a standard 30 ml black shot.

faqs.q: Does espresso have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: Trace carbs (~0.2 g per shot) from natural coffee compounds; 0 g added sugars.

faqs.q: Is espresso low in fat and protein?
faqs.a: Yes, 0 g fat and ~0.1 g protein per shot.

faqs.q: How does adding milk affect calories in espresso?
faqs.a: One ounce of steamed milk adds ~18 kcal, turning it into a basic latte.
